TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit DependsOnAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class DependsOnAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class DependsOnAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示屬性化屬性與另一個屬性的值相依。

span.span: Indicates that the attributed property is dependent on the value of another property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法處理設定這個屬性的屬性之前會處理指定的屬性。The method on will process the specified property before processing the property that this attribute is set on. `name`會套用至這個屬性的值必須是簡單的非限定的名稱存在於相同類型的屬性。The `name` value applied to this attribute must be the simple unqualified name of a property that exists in the same type. 您無法為相依指定附加的屬性。You cannot specify attached properties as being dependent. 當套用這個屬性，必須小心避免循環相依性。When applying this attribute, care must be taken to avoid circular dependencies. 已寫入循環中的所有屬性和即便如此，則行為是不具決定性時，只會偵測到循環相依性。Circular dependencies are only detected when all the properties in the cycle have been written and even so the behavior is nondeterministic. 將此屬性套用至屬性定義，可確保相依的屬性，會先處理 XAML 物件寫入。Applying this attribute to a property definition ensures that the dependent properties are processed first in XAML object writing. 它是適用於建立物件的屬性值應該可以任何順序進行處理的 XAML 標記的一般規則的一部分。It is part of the general rules of XAML markup that attribute values applied for a created object should be able to be processed in any order. 使用方式的建立有效的物件必須遵循剖析特定順序的型別上指定例外的情況下的屬性。Usages of specify the exceptional cases of properties on types where a specific order of parsing must be followed for valid object creation. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，這個類別會存在於 WindowsBase WPF 專屬組件中。In previous versions of the .NET Framework, this class existed in the WPF-specific assembly WindowsBase. 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)]，位於 System.Xaml 組件中。In [!INCLUDE[net_v40_long](~/includes/net-v40-long-md.md)], is in the System.Xaml assembly. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從 WPF 移轉至 System.Xaml 的類型](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md)。For more information, see [Types Migrated from WPF to System.Xaml](~/docs/framework/xaml-services/types-migrated-from-wpf-to-system-xaml.md). ## WPF 使用注意事項WPF Usage Notes 屬性類別是在 WPF 中屬性的範例位置屬性會套用。The property on the class is an example of a property in WPF where the attribute is applied. 取決於和第一次處理，否則就無法知道哪些類型應該為值轉換器的情況下建立。 depends on and being processed first, otherwise there is no way to know what type is supposed to be created for value converter cases.

The name of the related property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property TypeId As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ TypeId { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個 的唯一識別項。

span.span: Gets a unique identifier for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是可使用以允許多個具有相同屬性的覆寫行為的產生的值套用。This is a generated value that uses an override behavior in order to permit multiple attributes with the same to be applied. 只要沒有循環或否則模稜兩可，多個相依性。支援相同的屬性名稱的參考。So long as dependencies are not circular or otherwise ambiguous, multiple references to the same property name are supported.
